scripts.build: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist', { recursive: true })" && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node14 --minify --outfile=dist/index.js --banner:js="#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.build:dev: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist', { recursive: true })" && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node14 --outfile=dist/index.js --banner:js="#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.debug: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('debug', { recursive: true })" && tsc --outDir debug --sourceMap true --declaration true && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const content = fs.readFileSync('debug/index.js', 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('debug/index.js', '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + content);"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint:check && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run lint:check && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run publish:npm
